trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"></xref> implementation so that you can use the "weak event listener" pattern to attach listeners for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um <xref href="System.Windows.WeakEventManager"> </xref> implementação para que possa utilizar o padrão "serviço de escuta de eventos fracos" para ligar os serviços de escuta para o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: For information about how to use this class, see “Using an Existing Weak Event Manager Class“ in[Weak Event Patterns](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como utilizar esta classe, consulte "Utilizar um existente fraca eventos Manager Class" em[fracos de eventos de padrões](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified delegate as an event handler of the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o delegado especificado como um processador de eventos da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: source is .
trans-unit.target: sourceis .

trans-unit.source: --or-- handler is .
trans-unit.target: --or-- handler is .

trans-unit.source: Removes inactive listener entries from the data list for the provided source.
trans-unit.target: Remove a lista de dados para a origem de fornecido entradas de serviço de escuta inativa.

trans-unit.source: The source for events being listened to.
trans-unit.target: A origem para os eventos que está a ser listened para.

trans-unit.source: The data to check.
trans-unit.target: Os dados para verificar.

trans-unit.source: This object is expected to be a <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList> implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto é esperado um <xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList>implementação.</xref:System.Windows.WeakEventManager.ListenerList>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to stop listening to `source`, and completely remove all entries from `data`.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para parar a escutar `source`e remova completamente todas as entradas de `data`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if some entries were actually removed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se algumas entradas, na verdade, foram removidas; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified event handler from the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Remove o processador de eventos especificado da origem especificada.

trans-unit.source: The source object that the raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem que o gera o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: The delegate that handles the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: O delegado que processa o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.target: sourceis .

trans-unit.target: --or-- handler is .

trans-unit.source: Begins listening for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Começa a escutar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos na origem especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: The object with the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto com o evento.

trans-unit.source: Stops listening for the <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged> event on the specified source.
trans-unit.target: Interrompe a escutar o <xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>eventos na origem especificada.</xref:System.Windows.Input.ICommand.CanExecuteChanged>

trans-unit.source: The source object to stop listening for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto de origem para parar de escutar.
